index.description: A comma-separated list of index names; use `_all` or empty string to perform the operation on all indices

type.description: The name of the document type

wait_for_completion.description: Specify whether the caller will wait for the benchmark to complete or return immediately after submission (default: true)

verbose.description: Specify whether to return verbose statistics about each iteration (default: false)
